text: (January 8, 1947April 28, 2015) was a Japanese rugby player and professional wrestler. He was better known by his ring name . On April 28, 2015, Hara died from pneumonia in a hospital in Isahaya, Nagasaki. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Japanese sportspeople Category:People from Nagasaki Prefecture Category:Japanese professional wrestlers Category:Rugby union players
title: Ashura Hara
